verses.verse: being <S%G3754>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> that ye <S%G2075>are<s%> an <S%G1992>epistle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1247>ministered<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G1449>written<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G3188>ink<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> with the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of <S%G3035>stone<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> that are <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of <S%G4560>flesh<s%>.

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2427>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> sufficient as <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G615>killeth<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> giveth <S%G2227>life<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G1722>death<s%>, <S%G1121>written<s%>, and <S%G1795>engraven<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%>, <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, so <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G816>look<s%> stedfastly <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>; <S%G3588>which<s%> glory was passing <S%G2673>away<s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G2633>condemnation<s%> hath <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G4052>doth<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G4052>exceed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>verily<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> hath been made <S%G1392>glorious<s%> <S%G1392>hath<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> been made <S%G1392>glorious<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>respect<s%>, by reason <S%G1752>of<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5235>surpasseth<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> passeth <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G1223>was<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> <S%G1722>is<s%> in <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

and <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, who <S%G5087>put<s%> a <S%G2571>veil<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>, <S%G4314>that<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G816>look<s%> stedfastly <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of that <S%G3588>which<s%> was passing <S%G2673>away<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3540>minds<s%> were <S%G4456>hardened<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> this very <S%G4594>day<s%> at the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2571>veil<s%> <S%G3306>remaineth<s%>, it not <S%G1909>being<s%> <S%G343>revealed<s%> to them that <S%G3739>it<s%> <S%G5100>is<s%> done <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2259>whensoever<s%> <S%G302>it<s%> shall <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, the <S%G2571>veil<s%> is taken <S%G4014>away<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1563>is<s%>, there is <S%G1657>liberty<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G4383>with<s%> <S%G343>unveiled<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> beholding as in a <S%G2734>mirror<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, are <S%G3339>transformed<s%> into the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, even <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.
